author: Clémence Michallon, Clémence Michallon
title: Coronavirus: Karen O criticises likes of Trump for refences to 'Chinese virus'
description: 'Let's call it what it is, a global pandemic,' says singer
content:
Karen O is speaking out against people such as Donald Trump who refer to the coronavirus as the Chinese virus.
The singer, whose mother is Korean, broached the topic in a recent Instagram post.
As a member of the Asian American community I stand behind Asia… [+1291 chars]
